member.name: T:Task1.StringHelper
member.summary: The StringHelper class. Contains all methods for examining string.

member.name: M:Task1.StringHelper.GetVowelCount(System.String)
member.summary: Counts how many vowels are there in the input string.
member.exception: Thrown when input string is null.
Thrown when input string is empty.
member.returns: Amount of vowels in the input string.
